text: Lancia is an Italian automobile manufacturer. It was established in 1906. It has been owned by Fiat since 1969. == Current models == * Lancia Ypsilon == Historic models == * Lancia Beta * Lancia Dedra * Lancia Delta * Lancia Kappa * Lancia Lybra * Lancia Musa * Lancia Phedra * Lancia Prisma * Lancia Thema * Lancia Thesis * Lancia Zeta ==Other websites== * Official homepage Category:1906 establishments in Italy Category:Italian automobile companies
title: Lancia
